title: Marco Rubio on Zika and the abortion?
subtitle: Marco Rubio did not mention that the congenital defects associated with Zeka were a punishment of God, nor that abortion was an attempt to evade this provision.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Marco Rubio described the congenital defects associated with Zeka as God ' s punishment of the mother, and abortion as an unacceptable escape from this provision.
